title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.3 - Review of notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.3 - Review of notification

State Regulations

Upon receipt of notification of intent to dispose of
abandoned railroad transportation property and the necessary maps and
information previously described, a 120 day review period shall begin. The

Department of Transportation shall immediately institute investigations to
determine if the property is required for transportation purposes. At the same
time, all appropriate transportation authorities and State and local
governmental agencies shall be notified of the railroad company's intention, and be requested to determine if they desire to exercise the preferential
acquisition rights, should the department decide not to exercise the right in
this regard. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
973.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
